Term.Name: Violence
Term.Definition: The derivative has been edited to remove violent scenes.

Term.Name: Language
Term.Definition: The derivative has been edited to remove bad language.

Term.Name: Sex
Term.Definition: The derivative has been edited to remove scenes of a sexual nature.

Term.Name: Duration
Term.Definition: The derivative has been edited to alter its length.

Term.Name: Longer
Term.Definition: The derivative is an extended variant of the original.

Term.Name: Shorter
Term.Definition: The derivative is a shorter variant of the original, such as edited highlights.

Term.Name: Signing
Term.Definition: The derivative is a signed variant of the original.

Term.Name: Special cut
Term.Definition: The derivative is a special cut of the original.

Term.Name: Director's cut
Term.Definition: The derivative is the Director's Cut of the original.

Term.Name: Airline cut
Term.Definition: The derivative is a cut of the original to make it suitable for viewing on an aeroplane.
